name: Space Defense (Prototype)
description:
It's my prototype for RTS or Tower Defense game. I am trying to find more ideas to make a complete game.  This is the first time I use Universal Render Pipeline in Unity as well as Light 2D, Shader graph, Post-processing,... The final game will coming soon.

How to play:

- Build Argil, Stone Harvester nearby Argil, Stone meteors.

- Build Cannon, Laser, Rocket towers to defend your HQ.

- Red arrow shows the next wave's spawn position.
